citeinfo.title: Census 2020 Geography - Blocks, Block Groups, Tracts, Counties, and County Subdivisions
citeinfo.origin: U.S. Census Bureau and the Metropolitan Council

descript.abstract:
This 'Redistricting' version of the census data is the first release of the data.
This 2020 census redistricting geography database of the 7 county metropolitan area and the additional 12 collar county area was developed from the U.S. Census Bureau's Redistricting Census 2020 TIGER/Line files.
The Metropolitan Council downloaded this data from the Census Bureau's FTP site and created block, block group, tract, county subdivision (city), and county datasets from the original data. The block dataset was updated on Jan. 12, 2023 to add new Census Bureau urban and rural designations.
descript.purpose: For mapping and analysis of data from the U. S. Census Bureau.
descript.supplinf: Seven County Twin Cities Metropolitan Area and its 12 collar counties.

place.placekey: Twin Cities, Anoka County, Carver County, Dakota County, Hennepin County, Ramsey County, Scott County, Washington County, Chisago County, Isanti County, Sherburne County, Wright County, McLeod County, Sibley County, Le Sueur County, Rice County, Goodhue County, Pierce County, St. Croix County, Polk County

theme.themekey: census, demographics, census boundaries, 2020 census, blocks, block boundaries, census blocks, census block groups, census tracts, counties, county subdivisions, FIPS Place, MCDs

idinfo.accconst: None. This dataset is public domain under the Minnesota Government Data Practices Act (Minnesota Statutes Chapter 13). If the dataset is not available from the Online Linkage in Section 6, please contact the Distribution Contact Person.
idinfo.useconst: None. This dataset is public domain under the Minnesota Government Data Practices Act (Minnesota Statutes Chapter 13).

attracc.attraccr: Boundaries in TIGER files are close to but do not exactly follow natural borders like roads and rivers. In most cases, these discrepancies are small. However, the Census Bureau's county subdivision file has errors, particularly with the City of Carver and Dahlgren Township. For more information, see "How We Edited..." spreadsheet with more detail (https://metrocouncil.org/Data-and-Maps/Research-and-Data/Census-Data/How-we-edited-initial-2020-Census-Data.aspx). Users who need accurate county subdivision data should consult the Metropolitan Council's Counties, Cities, and Townships file.

dataqual.logic: Each county polygon file is topologically 'clean'.

horizpa.horizpar: Presumed to meet source material standards: for 1:100,000-scale mapping, National Map Accuracy Standards state a horizontal positional accuracy of not less than +/- 167 feet for 90% of points tested.

procstep.procdesc:
Data originated at the U.S. Bureau of the Census, as 2020 Census Redistricting TIGER/Line files (05/23/2021).
7-County FIPS 27-003 Anoka 27-019 Carver 27-037 Dakota 27-053 Hennepin 27-123 Ramsey 27-139 Scott 27-163 Washington
Collar County FIPS 27-025 Chisago 27-049 Goodhue 27-059 Isanti 27-079 LeSueur 27-085 McLeod 27-131 Rice 27-141 Sherburne 27-143 Sibley 27-171 Wright 55-093 Pierce 55-095 Polk 55-109 St. Croix
Statewide shape files were downloaded from the Census Bureau TIGER FTP site https://www.census.gov/geo/maps-data/data/tiger-line.html for the following 2020 boundaries: County, County Subdivisions, Tract, Block Group and Block. 7-county metro area was selected from each statewide shapefile and saved as a new shapefile. 9 MN collar counties and 3 WI collar counties were selected from each statewide shapefile and saved as a new shapefile - then Appended to 1-collar county shape file.
County_2020 - from state-based file - selected Cousub_2020 - from state-based file - selected (see Attribute Accuracy section for further details) Tract_2020 - from state-based file - selected Blkgrp_2020 - from state-based file - selected Block_2020 - from state-based file - selected Place_2020 - from state-based file - selected

spdoinfo.indspref: 2020 Census Block, Block Group or Tract
spdoinfo.mgmg3til: For each themes, one layer for entire seven county region and another layer for the 12 collar counties of the 7-county region.

overview.eaover:
Block State-based Shapefile Record Layout (2010 Geography) File Name: tl_2020_<state FIPS>_tabblock20.shp
Field Name, Length, Type, Description STATEFP20, 2, String, 2020 Census state FIPS code COUNTYFP20, 3, String, 2020 Census county FIPS code TRACTCE20, 6, String, 2020 Census census tract code BLOCKCE20, 4, String, 2020 Census tabulation block number GEOID20, 15, String, Block identifier; a concatenation of 2020 Census state FIPS code, county FIPS code, census tract code and tabulation block number. NAME20, 10, String, 2020 Census tabulation block name; a concatenation of 'Block' and the current tabulation block number MTFCC20, 5, String, MAF/TIGER feature class code (G5040) UR20, 1, String, 2020 Census urban/rural indicator UACE20, 5, String, 2020 Census urban area code UATYPE20, 1, String, 2020 Census urban area type FUNCSTAT20, 1, String, 2020 Census functional status ALAND20, 14, Number, 2020 Census land area (square meters) AWATER20, 14, Number, 2020 Census water area (square meters) INTPTLAT20, 11, String, 2020 Census latitude of the internal point INTPTLON20, 12, String, 2020 Census longitude of the internal point
Block Group State-based Shapefile Record Layout (Current) File Name: tl_2020_<state FIPS>_bg20.shp
Field Length Type Description STATEFP20, 2, String, Current (2020) state FIPS code COUNTYFP20, 3, String, Current (2020) county FIPS code TRACTCE20, 6, String, Current (2020) census tract code BLKGRPCE20, 1, String, Current (2020) block group number GEOID20, 12, String, Block identifier; a concatenation of current (2020) state FIPS code, county FIPS code, census tract code and block group number. NAMELSAD20, 13, String, Current (2020) translated legal/statistical area description and the block group number MTFCC20, 5, String, MAF/TIGER feature class code (G5030) FUNCSTAT20, 1, String, Current (2020) functional status ALAND20, 14, Number, Current (2020) land area (square meters) AWATER20, 14, Number, Current (2020) water area (square meters) INTPTLAT20, 11, String, Current (2020) latitude of the internal point INTPTLON20, 12, String, Current (2020) longitude of the internal point
Census Tract State-based Shapefile Record Layout (Current) File Name: tl_2020_<state FIPS>_tract20.shp
Field Length Type Description STATEFP20, 2, String, Current (2020) state FIPS code COUNTYFP20, 3, String, Current (2020) county FIPS code TRACTCE20, 6, String, Current (2020) census tract code GEOID20, 11, String, Census tract identifier; a concatenation of current (2020) state FIPS code, county FIPS code, and census tract code NAME20, 7, String, Current (2020) census tract name, this is the census tract code converted to an integer or integer with 2-decimals if the last two characters of the code are not both zeros. NAMELSAD20, 20, String, Current (2020) translated legal/statistical area description and the census tract name MTFCC20, 5, String, MAF/TIGER feature class code (G5020) FUNCSTAT20, 1, String, Current (2020) functional status ALAND20, 14, Number, Current (2020) land area (square meters) AWATER20, 14, Number, Current (2020) water area (square meters) INTPTLAT20, 11, String, Current (2020) latitude of the internal point INTPTLON20, 12, String, Current (2020) longitude of the internal point
County and Equivalent Entity State-based Shapefile Record Layout (Current) File Name: tl_2020_us_county.shp
Field Length Type Description STATEFP20, 2, String, Current (2020) state FIPS code COUNTYFP20, 3, String, Current (2020) county FIPS code COUNTYNS20, 8, String, Current (2020) county ANSI code GEOID20, 5, String, County identifier; a concatenation of Current (2020) state FIPS code and county FIPS code NAME20, 100, String, Current (2020) county name NAMELSAD20, 100, String, Current (2020) name and the translated legal/statistical area description for county LSAD20, 2, String, Current (2020) legal/statistical area description code for county CLASSFP20, 2, String, Current (2020) FIPS class code MTFCC20, 5, String, MAF/TIGER feature class code (G4020) CSAFP20, 3, String, Current (2020) combined statistical area code CBSAFP20, 5, String, Current (2020) metropolitan statistical area/micropolitan statistical area code METDIVFP20, 5, String, Current (2020) metropolitan division code FUNCSTAT20, 1, String, Current (2020) functional status ALAND20, 14, Number, Current (2020) land area (square meters) AWATER20, 14, Number, Current (2020) water area (square meters) INTPTLAT20, 11, String, Current (2020) latitude of the internal point INTPTLON20, 12, String, Current (2020) longitude of the internal point
County Subdivision State-based Shapefile Record Layout (Current) File Name: tl_2020_<state FIPS>_cousub20.shp
Field Length Type Description STATEFP20 2 String Current (2020) state FIPS code COUNTYFP20 3 String Current (2020) county FIPS code COUSUBFP20 5 String Current (2020) county subdivision FIPS code COUSUBNS20 8 String Current (2020) ANSI feature code for the county subdivision GEOID20 10 String County subdivision identifier; a concatenation of current (2020) state FIPS code, county FIPS code, and county subdivision FIPS code. NAME20 100 String Current (2020) county subdivision name NAMELSAD20 100 String Current (2020) name and the translated legal/statistical area description code for county subdivision LSAD20 2 String Current (2020) legal/statistical area description code for county subdivision CLASSFP20 2 String Current (2020) FIPS class code MTFCC20 5 String MAF/TIGER feature class code (G4040) CNECTAFP20 3 String Current (2020) combined New England city and town area code NECTAFP20 5 String Current (2020) New England city and town area code NCTADVFP20 5 String Current (2020) New England city and town area division code FUNCSTAT20 1 String Current (2020) functional status ALAND20 14 Number Current (2020) land area (square meters) AWATER20 14 Number Current (2020) water area (square meters) INTPTLAT20 11 String Current (2020) latitude of the internal point INTPTLON20 12 String Current (2020) longitude of the internal point

distinfo.distliab: NOTICE: The Geographic Information System (GIS) Data to which this notice is attached are made available pursuant to the Minnesota Government Data Practices Act (Minnesota Statutes Chapter 13). THE GIS DATA ARE PROVIDED TO YOU AS IS AND WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY AS TO THEIR PERFORMANCE, MERCHANTABILITY, OR FITNESS FOR ANY PARTICULAR PURPOSE. The GIS Data were developed by the Metropolitan Council for its own internal business purposes. The Metropolitan Council does not represent or warrant that the GIS Data or the data documentation are error-free, complete, current, or accurate. You are responsible for any consequences resulting from your use of the GIS Data or your reliance on the GIS Data. You should consult the data documentation for this particular GIS Data to determine the limitations of the GIS Data and the precision with which the GIS Data may depict distance, direction, location, or other geographic features. If you transmit or provide the GIS Data (or any portion of it) to another user, it is recommended that the GIS Data include a copy of this disclaimer and this metadata.
